Title: #152 Classroom Videos: How-to Tips and Tricks
Description:
Simply put, Tim Betts @mrbettsclass rocks YouTube history. As a certified YouTube educational channel, he’s one of those that history teachers will love! But he also teaches us how to do this with students.

www.coolcatteacher.com/e152 Today’s sponsor is Edpuzzle, a favorite #flipclass tool. Go to coolcatteacher.com/edpuzzle and sign up now to get 50K free curated video lessons for your school. Also, learn how to clip, pause, quiz, and interact with students inside your flipped classroom videos with this easy tool. Enjoy!
